title: Trump Wanted to Shoot American Protesters
summary: Defense Secretary Mark Esper said Trump wanted U.S. troops to shoot American protesters during George Floyd protests. Esper called Trump 'a threat to democracy' and said Trump is 'not fit for office because he puts himself first.'
keyFacts: Trump wanted U.S. troops to shoot American protesters during George Floyd protests
Mark Esper: 'Trump is not fit for office because he puts himself first'
Warned Trump might use military for political purposes in second term
Explicitly said he would not vote for Trump
Famously fired by Trump via Twitter

sources.text: NPR: Former Pentagon chief Esper says Trump asked about shooting protesters
CNN: Esper says Trump suggested shooting protesters after George Floyd's death
CBS News: Trump suggested shooting protesters, former defense secretary Mark Esper says
